ovdesc.p: Collectors are given incentives (in form of points which can be transformed to cash) based on their
performance and achievement of predefined targets.
External agencies are given commission based on amounts recovered and pulled out items against salary assignment.
Incentive calculation for Collectors’ activity will be done only if collection activities exceed more than mentioned for each collector.
